浪.definition: wave; breaker; unrestrained; dissipated; to stroll; to ramble

浪人.definition: vagrant; unemployed person; rōnin (wandering masterless samurai)

浪子回頭.definition: the return of a prodigal son (idiom)

浪子回頭金不換.pinyin: làng zi huí tóu jīn bù huàn
浪子回頭金不換.definition: a prodigal son returned home is worth more than gold

浪花.definition: spray; ocean spray; spindrift; fig. happenings from one's life; CL:朵[duo3]

浪蕩.definition: to loiter; to hang around; dissolute; licentious

浪谷.definition: trough of a wave; (fig.) low point; lowest level

浪費金錢.definition: to squander money; to spend extravagantly

浪跡.definition: to roam about; to wander without a home

浪跡天涯.definition: to roam far and wide (idiom); to travel the world

浪跡江湖.definition: to roam far and wide; to drift with the wind
